item.title: Scaling expriments with different AWS services
item.description: As part of my studies I had to write an assigment in the module electronic business. I decided to develop some kind of dummy REST api application where I could try different architectures. The reason for me to try this out was to see how the performance changes over time if you increase the load. I decided to use Go for this project, because it was designed for scalable cloud architectures and if you compile your code you just get a single binary file which you just have to upload to your machine and execute.
